Description: We are carrying out these works to prepare our electricity network for the connection of a new property to the underground electricity network. We have worked to minimise the length of time that this work will affect your property. This work will ensure that our electricity network can uphold the electricity usage in your area whilst also reducing the risk of you having an unplanned power cut. Smart Meter Cutout Change In Progress

This was previsouly planned for the 08/02/2021 but was cancelled due to the bad weather. A third party has requested that UK Power Networks switch off the power to allow them to carry out tree trimming safely around our overhead electricity cables in the Boyes Lane area. This work will ensure that the trees are trimmed to their satisfaction and are not close to our overhead electricity cables. When the third party has completed their works our engineers will be able to restore power. This will also reduce the possibility of you having an unplanned power cut by stopping these trees from potentially causing damage to our overhead electricity network. Which is why we need to complete this during the coronavirus pandemic. The government has given exemptions to certain industries and activities, this outage falls into this category.
